item.description:
** Important Change - someone booked a private cruse for Sept 2 so we will try for Sept 9! **

Trying this again - they say this is very popular so if we can get agreement that this will work for 3 or more of us, let's get reservations asap. If you want to do this but it's a bad night for you, let me know and we can try to find a better date - at the last meeting early Sept and Thursday seemed like it'd work.

Sunset Cruise: In search for the perfect sunset, you’ll get the grand tour of Salem Sound as we cruise by the shorelines of Salem, Marblehead, Beverly and through the Misery Islands.

* Daily at 6:30pm Aug. 16th-Labor Day
* 1½-hours in length
* Adults $16, Children $12

More info here
item.how_to_find_us: We will gather about 6:15 at the dock. We're usually not all that hard to spot...

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Salem Harbor Sunset Cruise - Book your own reservation & meet us there! $16
